update bus_customer
cust_name = #{custName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cust_user_id = #{custUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cust_create_id = #{custCreateId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cust_source = #{custSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cust_major = #{custMajor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cust_level = #{custLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

cust_address = #{custAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cust_createtime = #{custCreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update bus_customer set cust_name = #{custName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cust_user_id = #{custUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cust_create_id = #{custCreateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cust_source = #{custSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cust_major = #{custMajor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cust_level = #{custLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cust_linkman = #{custLinkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cust_phone = #{custPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cust_mobile = #{custMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cust_zipcode = #{custZipcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cust_address = #{custAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cust_createtime = #{custCreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where cust_id = #{custId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from bus_customer
and cust_id like concat ("%",#{custId},"%") and cust_name like concat ("%",#{custName},"%") and cust_user_id like concat ("%",#{custUserId},"%")
and cust_create_id like concat ("%",#{custCreateId},"%")
and cust_source like concat ("%",#{custSource},"%") and cust_major like concat ("%",#{custMajor},"%") and cust_level like concat ("%",#{custLevel},"%") and cust_linkman like concat ("%",#{custLinkman},"%")
and cust_createtime like concat ("%",#{custCreatetime,jdbcType=DATE},"%")
order by cust_createtime desc
